page.title: 19Our day at Bodenham Primary
page.content: We arrive at school between 8.50 and 9.10. Some come on the bus, some walk, some ride bicycles but most come in our parents cars. School starts at 9.15. After registration we go into assembly.Lessons begin at 9.30. We have a wide variety of lessons in the morning. Playtime is 11.00 to 11.15 and we all go out to the play ground. The infants play at one end and we play at the other. We play lots of games especially football. Dinner time is 12.00 for the infants and 12.10 for the juniors. Mrs Clarke, a parent, makes the dinners. They are really good. A favourite is baked potatoes, coleslaw, and quiche. We eat in family groups at tables of 8. After play at 1.15 we have lessons. These include art, craft, needlework, games, topics, and music. We have guitar, recorders, and choir clubs. The day ends at 3.30.
